channel.title: Utilizing Cache (508) Properly [need help]
channel.description:
I'm trying to start off making my server. I don't know if you'll know it, but the sources i'm using is "Bulby's 508" server, a 508 Client (couldn't find the maker in the folder), and a 508 cache. I'm getting an error when I try to run it:
Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_sub1:338 client:2194 | java.lang.runtime Exception
I've looked it up and found it means cache isn't working right, atleast that's what my information makes me think. So obviously I haven't installed it properly. Can someone give me a link to a tut or reply direct help on how to properly use (or whatever the correct term is [i would like to know, maybe install?]) my cache after i've downloaded it.
If you think something else could be wrong that'd be nice to. Sorry if I'm against the rules or in the wrong place, i know ignorance isn't an excuse to break the rules, but it's my first post. I just want some help from some friendly people.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 01:00:03 am[/size][hr]Hey if you get this problem I found the answer. A quick, simple tutorial on how to utilize the cache you've downloaded go here. --> http://www.pureportals.com/Default.aspx?tabid=224792
